name: MolochV3

display.label: Summon Complete
display.description: This event is emitted when a summoning process is complete.

operation.signature: event SummonComplete(address indexed summoner, address[] tokens, uint256 summoningTime, uint256 periodDuration, uint256 votingPeriodLength, uint256 gracePeriodLength, uint256 proposalDeposit, uint256 dilutionBound, uint256 processingReward)

inputFields.label: Summoner
inputFields.helpText: The address of the summoner

inputFields.label: Tokens
inputFields.helpText: An array of token addresses

inputFields.label: Summoning Time
inputFields.helpText: The time when the summoning process started

inputFields.label: Period Duration
inputFields.helpText: The duration of each period

inputFields.label: Voting Period Length
inputFields.helpText: The length of the voting period

inputFields.label: Grace Period Length
inputFields.helpText: The length of the grace period

inputFields.label: Proposal Deposit
inputFields.helpText: The deposit required to make a proposal

inputFields.label: Dilution Bound
inputFields.helpText: The maximum amount of tokens that can be diluted

inputFields.label: Processing Reward
inputFields.helpText: The reward for processing a proposal

display.label: Submit Proposal
display.description: The SubmitProposal event is triggered when a proposal is submitted.

operation.signature: event SubmitProposal(address indexed applicant, uint256 sharesRequested, uint256 lootRequested, uint256 tributeOffered, address tributeToken, uint256 paymentRequested, address paymentToken, string details, bool[6] flags, uint256 proposalId, address indexed delegateKey, address indexed memberAddress)

inputFields.label: Applicant
inputFields.helpText: The address of the applicant who submitted the proposal.

inputFields.label: Shares Requested
inputFields.helpText: The number of shares requested in the proposal.

inputFields.label: Loot Requested
inputFields.helpText: The amount of loot requested in the proposal.

inputFields.label: Tribute Offered
inputFields.helpText: The amount of tribute offered in the proposal.

inputFields.label: Tribute Token
inputFields.helpText: The address of the token used for tribute.

inputFields.label: Payment Requested
inputFields.helpText: The amount of payment requested in the proposal.

inputFields.label: Payment Token
inputFields.helpText: The address of the token used for payment.

inputFields.label: Details
inputFields.helpText: Additional details or description of the proposal.

inputFields.label: Flags
inputFields.helpText: An array of boolean flags with 6 elements.

inputFields.label: Proposal Id
inputFields.helpText: The ID of the proposal.

inputFields.label: Delegate Key
inputFields.helpText: The delegate key address used for voting on the proposal.

inputFields.label: Member Address
inputFields.helpText: The address of the member who submitted the proposal.

display.label: Sponsor Proposal
display.description: This event is triggered when a sponsor proposes a new proposal.

operation.signature: event SponsorProposal(address indexed delegateKey, address indexed memberAddress, uint256 proposalId, uint256 proposalIndex, uint256 startingPeriod)

inputFields.label: Delegate Key
inputFields.helpText: The address of the delegate key.

inputFields.label: Member Address
inputFields.helpText: The address of the member.

inputFields.label: Proposal Id
inputFields.helpText: The ID of the proposal.

inputFields.label: Proposal Index
inputFields.helpText: The index of the proposal.

inputFields.label: Starting Period
inputFields.helpText: The starting period of the proposal.

display.label: Submit Vote
display.description: This event is triggered when a vote is submitted.

operation.signature: event SubmitVote(uint256 proposalId, uint256 indexed proposalIndex, address indexed delegateKey, address indexed memberAddress, uint8 uintVote)

inputFields.label: Proposal Id
inputFields.helpText: The ID of the proposal being voted on.

inputFields.label: Proposal Index
inputFields.helpText: The index of the proposal in the array of proposals.

inputFields.label: Delegate Key
inputFields.helpText: The address of the delegate key.

inputFields.label: Member Address
inputFields.helpText: The address of the member who submitted the vote.

inputFields.label: Uint Vote
inputFields.helpText: The vote value (0 for 'no', 1 for 'yes').

display.label: Process Proposal
display.description: This event is triggered when a proposal is processed.

operation.signature: event ProcessProposal(uint256 indexed proposalIndex, uint256 indexed proposalId, bool didPass)

inputFields.label: Proposal Index
inputFields.helpText: The index of the proposal in the array of proposals.

inputFields.label: Proposal Id
inputFields.helpText: The ID of the proposal.

inputFields.label: Did Pass
inputFields.helpText: A boolean indicating whether the proposal passed or not.

display.label: Process Whitelist Proposal
display.description: This event is triggered when a whitelist proposal is processed.

operation.signature: event ProcessWhitelistProposal(uint256 indexed proposalIndex, uint256 indexed proposalId, bool didPass)

inputFields.label: Proposal Index
inputFields.helpText: The index of the proposal in the whitelist

inputFields.label: Proposal Id
inputFields.helpText: The ID of the proposal

inputFields.label: Did Pass
inputFields.helpText: A boolean indicating whether the proposal passed or not

display.label: Process Guild Kick Proposal
display.description: This event is triggered when a guild kick proposal is processed.

operation.signature: event ProcessGuildKickProposal(uint256 indexed proposalIndex, uint256 indexed proposalId, bool didPass)

inputFields.label: Proposal Index
inputFields.helpText: The index of the proposal in the array of proposals.

inputFields.label: Proposal Id
inputFields.helpText: The ID of the proposal.

inputFields.label: Did Pass
inputFields.helpText: A boolean indicating whether the proposal passed or not.

display.label: Ragequit
display.description: This event is triggered when a member ragequits.

operation.signature: event Ragequit(address indexed memberAddress, uint256 sharesToBurn, uint256 lootToBurn)

inputFields.label: Member Address
inputFields.helpText: The address of the member who ragequits.

inputFields.label: Shares To Burn
inputFields.helpText: The number of shares to burn.

inputFields.label: Loot To Burn
inputFields.helpText: The amount of loot to burn.

display.label: Tokens Collected
display.description: This event is triggered when tokens are collected.

operation.signature: event TokensCollected(address indexed token, uint256 amountToCollect)

inputFields.label: Token
inputFields.helpText: The address of the token being collected.

inputFields.label: Amount To Collect
inputFields.helpText: The amount of tokens to be collected.

display.label: Cancel Proposal
display.description: This event is triggered when a proposal is canceled.

operation.signature: event CancelProposal(uint256 indexed proposalId, address applicantAddress)

inputFields.label: Proposal Id
inputFields.helpText: The ID of the proposal that was canceled.

inputFields.label: Applicant Address
inputFields.helpText: The address of the applicant who made the proposal.

display.label: Update Delegate Key
display.description: This event is triggered when the delegate key of a member is updated.

operation.signature: event UpdateDelegateKey(address indexed memberAddress, address newDelegateKey)

inputFields.label: Member Address
inputFields.helpText: The address of the member whose delegate key is being updated.

inputFields.label: New Delegate Key
inputFields.helpText: The new delegate key address.

display.label: Withdraw
display.description: This event is triggered when a member withdraws a certain amount of tokens.

operation.signature: event Withdraw(address indexed memberAddress, address token, uint256 amount)

inputFields.label: Member Address
inputFields.helpText: The address of the member who made the withdrawal.

inputFields.label: Token
inputFields.helpText: The address of the token being withdrawn.

inputFields.label: Amount
inputFields.helpText: The amount of tokens being withdrawn.

display.label: Proposals (View function)
display.description: This function returns multiple values related to a proposal.

operation.signature: function proposals(uint256 param0) view returns (address, address, address, uint256, uint256, uint256, address, uint256, address, uint256, uint256, uint256, string, uint256)

inputFields.label: Param 0
inputFields.helpText: The index of the proposal.

display.label: Processing Reward (View function)
display.description: This function returns the amount of reward that has been processed.

display.label: Get Member Proposal Vote (View function)
display.description: This function retrieves the vote of a member on a specific proposal.

operation.signature: function getMemberProposalVote(address memberAddress, uint256 proposalIndex) view returns (uint8)

inputFields.label: Member Address
inputFields.helpText: The address of the member

inputFields.label: Proposal Index
inputFields.helpText: The index of the proposal

outputFields.label: Return value of Get Member Proposal Vote

display.label: Get Current Period (View function)
display.description: This function returns the current period.

outputFields.label: Return value of Get Current Period

display.label: Members (View function)
display.description: This function retrieves the details of a member in the contract.

operation.signature: function members(address param0) view returns (address, uint256, uint256, bool, uint256, uint256)

inputFields.label: Param 0
inputFields.helpText: The address of the member.

display.label: Withdraw Balance
display.description: Withdraws a specified amount of tokens from the user's balance.

inputFields.label: Token
inputFields.helpText: The address of the token to withdraw from.

inputFields.label: Amount
inputFields.helpText: The amount of tokens to withdraw.

display.label: Submit Guild Kick Proposal
display.description: This function submits a guild kick proposal for a specific member.

operation.signature: function submitGuildKickProposal(address memberToKick, string details) returns (uint256)

inputFields.label: Member To Kick
inputFields.helpText: The address of the member to be kicked.

inputFields.label: Details
inputFields.helpText: Additional details or reasons for the kick proposal.

display.label: Ragequit
display.description: The ragequit function allows a user to burn a certain amount of shares and loot.

inputFields.label: Shares To Burn
inputFields.helpText: The number of shares to burn.

inputFields.label: Loot To Burn
inputFields.helpText: The number of loot to burn.

display.label: Approved Tokens (View function)
display.description: This function returns the address of the approved token for a given parameter.

inputFields.label: Param 0
inputFields.helpText: The parameter value for which the approved token address is to be retrieved.

display.label: Update Delegate Key
display.description: Updates the delegate key for the user.

inputFields.label: New Delegate Key
inputFields.helpText: The new delegate key address.

display.label: TOTAL (View function)
display.description: The TOTAL function is a view function that returns an address.

display.label: Process Whitelist Proposal
display.description: This function processes a whitelist proposal identified by the given proposal index.

inputFields.label: Proposal Index
inputFields.helpText: The index of the proposal to be processed.

display.label: Total Shares (View function)
display.description: This function returns the total number of shares.

display.label: Proposal Queue (View function)
display.description: This function returns the proposal queue at the specified index.

inputFields.label: Param 0
inputFields.helpText: The index of the proposal queue.

display.label: Proposed To Kick (View function)
display.description: Checks if the specified address has been proposed to be kicked.

inputFields.label: Param 0
inputFields.helpText: The address to check.

outputFields.label: Return value of Proposed To Kick

actions.name: Member Address By Delegate Key (View function)

display.label: Member Address By Delegate Key (View function)
display.description: This function returns the address associated with a given delegate key.

inputFields.label: Param 0
inputFields.helpText: The delegate key for which to retrieve the associated address.

outputFields.label: Return value of Member Address By Delegate Key

display.label: Withdraw Balances
display.description: Withdraws balances of multiple tokens from a specific address.

operation.signature: function withdrawBalances(address[] tokens, uint256[] amounts, bool max)

inputFields.label: Tokens
inputFields.helpText: Array of token addresses

inputFields.label: Amounts
inputFields.helpText: Array of amounts to withdraw

inputFields.label: Max
inputFields.helpText: Flag indicating whether to withdraw the maximum balance

display.label: User Token Balances (View function)
display.description: This function returns the token balance of a user for a specific token.

operation.signature: function userTokenBalances(address param0, address param1) view returns (uint256)

inputFields.label: Param 0
inputFields.helpText: The address of the user

inputFields.label: Param 1
inputFields.helpText: The address of the token

outputFields.label: Return value of User Token Balances

display.label: Submit Proposal
display.description: Submits a proposal to the contract.

display.label: Collect Tokens

inputFields.helpText: The address from which tokens will be collected.

display.description: This function returns the total amount of loot available.

display.description: This function returns the length of the grace period.

display.label: Get User Token Balance (View function)
display.description: This function retrieves the balance of a specific token for a given user.

operation.signature: function getUserTokenBalance(address user, address token) view returns (uint256)

inputFields.helpText: The address of the user for whom the token balance is being retrieved.

inputFields.helpText: The address of the token for which the balance is being retrieved.

display.description: This function returns the total number of tokens in the guild bank.

display.label: Init
display.description: Initializes the contract with the specified parameters.

operation.signature: function init(address[] _summoner, address[] _approvedTokens, uint256 _periodDuration, uint256 _votingPeriodLength, uint256 _gracePeriodLength, uint256 _proposalDeposit, uint256 _dilutionBound, uint256 _processingReward, uint256[] _summonerShares)

inputFields.label: Summoner
inputFields.helpText: An array of addresses representing the summoners.

inputFields.label: Approved Tokens
inputFields.helpText: An array of addresses representing the approved tokens.

inputFields.label: Period Duration
inputFields.helpText: The duration of each period.

inputFields.label: Voting Period Length
inputFields.helpText: The length of the voting period.

inputFields.label: Grace Period Length
inputFields.helpText: The length of the grace period.

inputFields.label: Proposal Deposit
inputFields.helpText: The amount of deposit required to create a proposal.

inputFields.label: Dilution Bound
inputFields.helpText: The maximum percentage of shares that can be diluted.

inputFields.label: Processing Reward
inputFields.helpText: The reward amount for processing proposals.

inputFields.label: Summoner Shares
inputFields.helpText: An array of shares for each summoner.

display.label: Dilution Bound (View function)
display.description: This function returns the dilution bound as a uint256 value.

display.description: This function retrieves the flags associated with a specific proposal.

inputFields.label: Proposal Id
inputFields.helpText: The ID of the proposal.

outputFields.label: Return value of Get Proposal Flags

display.label: Member List (View function)
display.description: This function returns the address of a member based on the given parameter.

inputFields.helpText: The parameter is an unsigned integer value.

display.label: Period Duration (View function)
display.description: This function returns the duration of a period.

display.label: Deposit Token (View function)
display.description: This function allows users to deposit a token into the contract.

display.label: Proposal Count (View function)
display.description: This function returns the total number of proposals.

display.label: Ragekick
display.description: The `ragekick` function allows the contract owner to forcefully remove a member from the contract.

inputFields.label: Member To Kick
inputFields.helpText: The address of the member to be kicked.

display.label: Cancel Proposal
display.description: This function cancels a proposal with the given ID.

inputFields.label: Proposal Id
inputFields.helpText: The ID of the proposal to be canceled.

display.label: Proposed To Whitelist (View function)
display.description: Checks if the given address is proposed to be whitelisted.

inputFields.label: Param 0
inputFields.helpText: The address to check if it is proposed to be whitelisted.

outputFields.label: Return value of Proposed To Whitelist

display.label: Process Guild Kick Proposal
display.description: This function is used to process a guild kick proposal.

inputFields.helpText: The index of the proposal to be processed.

display.label: Process Proposal
display.description: This function is used to process a proposal identified by its index.

inputFields.label: Proposal Index
inputFields.helpText: The index of the proposal to be processed.

display.label: ESCROW (View function)
display.description: This function returns the address of the escrow contract.

display.label: GUILD (View function)
display.description: This function returns the address of the guild.

display.description: Submits a whitelist proposal for a token.

operation.signature: function submitWhitelistProposal(address tokenToWhitelist, string details) returns (uint256)

inputFields.label: Token To Whitelist
inputFields.helpText: The address of the token to be whitelisted.

inputFields.helpText: Additional details about the whitelist proposal.

description: Web3 connector for interacting with a DAO smart contract.
